name: Aadhaar‚Äè
content: Instantly operable bank account is now possible. Use Aadhaar based eKYC service to open a new account in a completely paperless manner. To know your own Aadhaar eKYC auth history, see - https://resident.uidai.gov.in/notification-aadhaar #AadhaarFacts

name: Aadhaar‚Äè
content: Aadhaar based e-KYC is a paperless and digital way of sharing KYC (Know Your Customer) information for any service. Know more about eKYC here-  https://www.egov-nsdl.co.in/e-kyc.html  #AadhaarFacts
